ISSUE.TITLE: Gitness Integration with Open Source Dev Environment Manager.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, I am working on project. I want to add support for gitness to be added as git-provider. I am facing one small problem where I need to fetch Organizations via API. I have checked all swagger APIs. but did not find useful. I don't even know does gitness support Organizations like github? Can anyone tell me how do I fetch Organizations via API?
